summary: The module provides a test suite for the PixArt Alpha diffusion pipeline, including fast unit tests and comprehensive integration tests that verify image generation from text prompts across multiple resolutions, batch sizes, and scheduler configurations while ensuring deterministic behavior and proper resource cleanup.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the PixArt Alpha image generation pipeline to prevent regressions and guarantee reliable performance for downstream applications that rely on high‑quality text‑to‑image synthesis.
